import { Fragment } from "react" import Head from "next/head" import Link from "next/link" import Header from "../header" import Footer from "../footer" import { toast, ToastContainer } from 'react-nextjs-toast' export default function Registartion() { const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() let name = e.target.name.value let email = e.target.name.email let password = e.target.name.password let confirmPassword = e.target.name.confirmPassword if (confirmPassword !== password) { toast.notify(`${props.iscartpage ? "Cart updated" : "Added to cart"}`, { type: "error", title: "Success!!!" }) } } return ( Registartion - Gandhi
